item.title: Forms
item.description: A lab for working with React and forms. Use controlled components to build a simple form that calculates a user’s input

item.title: Side Effects
item.description: In this lab you will clone an existing React project add the useEffect hook to properly fetch data from a RESTful server.

item.title: Context
item.description: In this lab you will be replacing Prop Drilling with the Context API. Instructions for the lab can be found here.

item.title: Budget App
item.description: A lab for working with components, props, state, and events. Part 1: Setup Let’s start by spinning up a react app and creating our first component.
